name: HeroesQuiz
0:
”Alexa open heroes quiz”
”guess my hero”
”play hero of the day”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: heroes quiz
des:
Heroes quiz is a tribute to all our American heroes who inspire us to dream. Alexa asks the user 3 questions to guess their hero.

The 3 questions are 
What is your hero's age?
Which state was your hero born in ?
What is your hero's profession?

If alexa is able to guess it correctly, Alexa plays a video on the heroes life.
The the users are asked 5 multiple choice questions on their hero. Each question has 4 options and to answer the users just have to say the option number. At the end of the game, the user is shown the score.

The following five professions are supported for now:-
Athletes
Actors
Entrepreneurs
Politicians
Singers

Although being voice first, the skill provides an immersive visual experience for users to play the quiz from touch enabled devices.
To honour our heroes we also have a hero of the day segment updated daily with a new hero
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
